message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM. 

The paper proposes a deep learning approach to model human sense of style compatibility between items based on their attributes, specifically using title descriptions. This involves using a Siamese Convolutional Neural Network architecture to map pairs of compatible or incompatible items from a symbolic word space to an embedded style space. Given this focus on image and text processing, the most likely sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV), followed by information retrieval (cs.IR) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also involves machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) aspects, which are also relevant sub-categories.
